Platform: Xbox 360

Developer: Tecmo Koei
Publisher: Tecmo Koei 
Genre: Sports (Historical) 
Release Date: TBD in Spain 2011 

Description: 
------------ 
Champion Jockey uses motion control functionality to simulate jockey experience a degree of accuracy beyond anything I've played in a game of horse racing. Players can learn to use the reins and the whip, thus changing your body weight to ride his thoroughbred to victory. In addition to controlling your horse, players must understand their unique rhythm, potential, resistance and preferred style of driving really master the game. 
Champion Jockey reproduces the world of horse racing in Europe and Japan, which incorporates both horse racing and jumping. Players can feel the thrill of competing in detailed achievements of the worlds of horse racing in Europe and Japan. The game also supports a variety of networking - a great step forward for video game racing. Online multiplayer racing, live score Jockey and an array of downloadable content will be available to players.
